ZZ_CMAP_TOP_PACKED_0 - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
 
ZZ_ERROR_MSG - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Error messages for OberonScanner.ZZ_UNKNOWN_ERROR, OberonScanner.ZZ_NO_MATCH, and OberonScanner.ZZ_PUSHBACK_2BIG respectively.
ZZ_LEXSTATE - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
ZZ_LEXSTATE[l] is the state in the DFA for the lexical state l ZZ_LEXSTATE[l+1] is the state in the DFA for the lexical state l at the beginning of a line l is of the form l = 2*k, k a non negative integer
ZZ_NO_MATCH - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Error code for "could not match input".
ZZ_PUSHBACK_2BIG - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Error code for "pushback value was too large".
ZZ_ROWMAP - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Translates a state to a row index in the transition table
ZZ_ROWMAP_PACKED_0 - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
 
ZZ_TRANS - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
The transition table of the DFA
ZZ_TRANS_PACKED_0 - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
 
ZZ_UNKNOWN_ERROR - 类中的静态变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Error code for "Unknown internal scanner error".
zzAtBOL - 类中的变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Whether the scanner is currently at the beginning of a line.
zzAtEOF - 类中的变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Whether the scanner is at the end of file.
zzBuffer - 类中的变量 scanner.OberonScanner
This buffer contains the current text to be matched and is the source of the OberonScanner.yytext() string.
zzCanGrow() - 类中的方法 scanner.OberonScanner
Whether the scanner buffer can grow to accommodate a larger token.

Contains user EOF-code, which will be executed exactly once, when the end of file is reached

Marks the last character in the buffer, that has been read from input.
zzEOFDone - 类中的变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Whether the user-EOF-code has already been executed.
zzFinalHighSurrogate - 类中的变量 scanner.OberonScanner

zzLexicalState - 类中的变量 scanner.OberonScanner
Current lexical state.
